patterns: What are the things that the bot can tell
responses:
Hello, I can tell you about various things like
Functions of DSC in general and it's community working in TIET, Patiala
About the team members
Current Projects and the Upcoming events
Recruitment Procedure

patterns: how to be a part of the community
responses: We are an open community. You can be a part of our ongoing projects as a contributor or you can become a part of our core team when we have our requirements. Stay tuned to our Slack Workspace for all kind of notifications
Hello, How can i help you?
You're welcome
My Pleasure
No Problem!

patterns: what is the purpose of dsc
responses: Google collaborates with university students who are passionate about growing developer communities.Developer Student Club powered by Google Developers is an initiative to grow their knowledge on developer technologies and more through peer to peer workshops and events, and gain relevant industry experience.

Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, previously known as Thapar University, is a private institute deemed to be university, in Patiala. It was founded in 1956 by Karam Chand Thapar. The institute has been granted full autonomy and the status of deemed-to-be-university by the University Grants Commission.(For more info)
